title.rendered: Natasa Stankovic and Hardik Pandya Announce Separation

content.rendered:
Natasa Stankovic and Hardik Pandya have announced separation. On Thursday night, the couple issued a reputable statement and confirmed that they may not be together. They referred to it become a “hard decision” for both of them and shared that they may continue to co-discern their 3-yr-antique son, Agastya.

“After four years of being together, Hardik and I have decided to together element approaches. We attempted our pleasant collectively and gave it our all, and we consider this is inside a great hobby for both of us. This became a tough selection for us to make, given the pleasure, mutual appreciation and companionship we enjoyed together and as we grew a circle of relatives,” the declaration study.

“we’re blessed with Agastya, who will stay at the center of each of our lives and we will co-discern to make certain that we deliver him the whole thing that we can for his happiness. We truly request your assistance and expertise to present us privacy throughout this difficult and sensitive time,” it brought.

Natasa Stankovic and Hardik Pandya Spark Separation

Former Bigg Boss contestant and dancer Natasa Stankovic married cricketer Hardik Pandya on May 31, 2020. The couple renewed their wedding ceremony vows in keeping with the Hindu and Christian rituals in February 2023.

but, speculations concerning their separation started in May and this year when netizens observed that the model removed the ‘Pandya’ surname from her Instagram deal. Later, a Reddit submission titled “Natasa and Hardik separated?” additionally went viral and caught absolutely everyone’s attention. The put-up claimed that the 2 were posting images with each other and wondered about Natasa’s absence from IPL 2024 suits.

in advance this month, Natasa posted a video on Instagram tales that seemed to verify the separation rumors. within the clip, she said, “Just a mild reminder from me to you again, God did no longer get rid of the pink Sea, He truly parted it because of this, he received cast off a hassle from your lifestyles, he’s going to absolutely make a way via it.”

in the meantime, Natasa has seemingly moved to her fatherland, Serbia. On Wednesday, she was spotted at the Mumbai airport together with her son, Agastya. She became seen carrying luggage as she unnoticed the paparazzi and averted posing for the cameras.

Read Also: Hardik Pandya to skip ODI series in Sri Lanka: Reports
